sqlMap.select: SELECT CSCODE as csCode, MATERIELCODE as materielCode, CARGOSPACECODE as cargoSpaceCode, CSSTARTPRICE as csStartPrice, CSSTARTNUMBER as csStartNumber, CSCHECKPRICE as csCheckPrice, CSCHECKNUMBER as csCheckNumber, CSDIFFMESSAGE as csDiffMessage, CSREMARK as csRemark, CSGM as csGM FROM CHECKSTOCKLIST where CSCODE=#csCode#
